EmailTemplate.description: Used by the Opportunity Approval Process.
EmailTemplate.name: Margin Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Opportunity Approval Required: {!Opportunity.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please review the following opportunity for {!Account.Name}. {!Opportunity.OwnerFullName} is quoting {!Opportunity.Amount} for a job with total cost of {!Opportunity.Gross_Margin__c}, which is 2.17% below average for this customer segment.
To approve or reject this, please reply to this email with one of the following words in the first line: APPROVE, APPROVED, YES, NO, REJECT, or REJECTED. You may also add comments on the second line of the email.
To go to the opportunity, please click here: {!Opportunity.Link}.
Thank you!
